EmailTemplate.name: Paid Invoice
EmailTemplate.subject: YOU GOT PAID!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congrats!! {!Opportunity.Account} Just paid {!Opportunity.Paid_Amount__c} to fulfill invoice number {!Opportunity.Invoice_Number__c} on Project {!Opportunity.Name}.
If you have any questions please email Rich, Gita, or Keith.
Keep the money Rolling!
